title: The Three Stooges Season 1 DVD Rip reformatted to widescreen
description:
Okay here is the first season and yes there were only 4 episodes.

Now these are DVD rips that I downloaded from a Newsgroup originally 576 x 432 which was probably the originally transmitted 4x3 format.

I trimmed 30 pixels off the top and 60 of the bottom and resized them to 720 X 412
So they look and play quite nicely on current wide screen TV,s .

As my upload speed is only 100kb/s maximum I rely on others re-seeding it once itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up so I can put up all the other seasons, if there is enough interest.

So if you want more then keep seeding because if I see no seeds I will assume no one is really interested.
